questions.quote: George, Quinn here was moving a chair...he lost his balance and dropped it...it must have fallen on your briefcase, which, for some reason, contained a running tape recorder?
Hey look ,you know, you're the one who's locked out. I'm letting you stay here. You're wearing my bathrobe. You should adapt to me.
Come on, Jerry, this is a security issue!  Boy, you wouldn't last a DAY in the Army.
You should slow down, you know that? It's dangerous to go that fast.
You know I uh, spilled a yogurt smoothie in here two days ago. Hm, Can't smell anything, can ya?
I'll tell you what, why don't you read this book and let's just see if you can explain it to me.
Alright!  Hello, Alec? Hi, it's Jerry Seinfeld. You know, you got a great 'John Houseman' name. Alec Berg. Did you hand in your assignment, Mr. Berg?
So, she went out with you on a first date.. and it was her birthday?
Hey. I've kept the same job for more than two years. It's not luck. Elaine, have you ever sent a racy photograph of yourself to anyone?
What's going on? What's going on? I'll tell you what's going on. I'm fired!
